description:
They are built tough from 12 oz denim fabric, ensuring durability against daily wear and tear. With a composition of 71 % cotton, 25 % recycled polyester, 2,5 % rayon and 1,5 % spandex., they offer a comfortable fit and the right amount of stretch for unrestricted movement.

These practical pants feature five functional pockets, providing convenient storage for your tools, accessories, and personal items. The reliable YKK® metal zipper ensures smooth closure, enhancing the overall durability of the pants.

To reinforce vulnerable areas, we've incorporated triple-needle stitching on the main seams. This stitching technique enhances strength and longevity, enabling the pants to withstand the demands of your work environment.

Confidently tackle any task with our Denim Pants, designed to deliver comfort and durability. They are the perfect choice for individuals who value quality workwear that can withstand the challenges of their profession.
name: Hooke Denim Pants - Mens
